terms.title: General Terms

We reserve the rights to change prices and revise the resources usage policy in any moment.

terms.title: License

These Terms & Conditions are a contract between you and Trust Circle Referrals (referred to in these Terms & Conditions as “Trust Circle Referrals”, “us”, “we” or “our”), the provider of the Trust Circle Referrals website and the services accessible from the Trust Circle Referrals website (which are collectively referred to in these Terms & Conditions as the “Trust Circle Referrals Service”).You are agreeing to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms & Conditions, please do not use the Trust Circle Referrals Service. In these Terms & Conditions, “you” refers both to you as an individual and to the entity you represent. If you violate any of these Terms & Conditions, we reserve the right to cancel your account or block access to your account without notice.

terms.title: Meanings
terms.description: -Cookie:small amount of data generated by a website and saved by your web browser. It is used to identify your browser, provide analytics, remember information about you such as your language preference or login information. -Company: when this policy mentions “Company,” “we,” “us,” or “our,” it refers to JG Rocket Reps LLC, (20629 Woodcreek blvd, Northville mi 48167) that is responsible for your information under this Terms & Conditions.-Country: where Trust Circle Referrals or the owners/founders of Trust Circle Referrals are based, in this case is United States-Device:any internet connected device such as a phone, tablet, computer or any other device that can be used to visit Trust Circle Referrals and use the services.-Service: refers to the service provided by Trust Circle Referrals as described in the relative terms (if available) and on this platform.-Third-party service:refers to advertisers, contest sponsors, promotional and marketing partners, and others who provide our content or whose products or services we think may interest you.-Website: Trust Circle Referrals.”s” site, which can be accessed via this URL:-You: a person or entity that is registered with Trust Circle Referrals to use the Services.
